message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this great product with you. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. That price is a little too high for me though. Would you consider $60?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $60. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110
I appreciate you meeting me a bit lower, Alice. How about we settle at $75? That's a fair price.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I can do $95, but that's as low as I can go
